p: Also several of the previous reviewers found it difficult to determine the actual aim of the data-driven exercise. While we understand and are sympathetic to the point that this is not a traditional hypothesis-driven study, it still needs an aim if not a hypothesis. Could the last line of the first paragraph be reworked into what the aim of this was? (e.g. is it to determine the most important factors that are associated with initiating influenza transmission in the continental USA at the beginning of each season?)
